remarks: In an undirected simple graph, a closed walk of length 2 represented as word is a word consisting of 2 symbols representing vertices connected by an edge.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Sep-2018.)
statement: clwwlkn2 $p |- ( V USGrph E -> ( W e. ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` 2 ) <-> ( ( # ` W ) = 2 /\ W e. Word V /\ { ( W ` 0 ) , ( W ` 1 ) } e. ran E ) ) ) $.
